website_summaries.verdict: A tasty, healthy treat that assists older cats in joint and skin health.
pros: Treats are designed to assist with joint pain and irritated skin
These can be enjoyed whole, or can be crumbled and mixed into food
Strong salmon scent is appealing to cats
Made from quality, U.S. sourced ingredients
cons: Treats are large and need to be broken up for smaller cats

website_summaries.verdict: An easy way to get all the natural benefits of salmon for your cat.
pros: A great source of omega 3 fatty acids, which help improve joints, skin, and your cat's coat
Can be used for dogs as well
cons: Skin is still attached to many treats, which is hard and can be a choking hazard

customer_reviews.title: doggie extortion
customer_reviews.text: dried fish. Not a new idea, but a classic revisited. Tastes just like fish. Yes, I ate one. The dog freaked, but then I gave him one too. He says that one was good but he should test the rest of the jar for quality before deciding. Fortunately he doesn't know how to open a jar nor can he type, so I still have a job.
customer_reviews.author: RedEdwards

customer_reviews.title: My cats choked and could have been killed.
customer_reviews.text: Still has the fish skin attached to the meat, choked my cats twice because the skin is so hard they couldn't chew it. I started cutting the skin off with a steak knife and found bones too. Might be ok for a German shepherd dog or other large breeds, but watch out if you have a small breed or cats.
customer_reviews.author: James Daly

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: My cats SUPER love these. They are the only treats they haven't stopped eating after the second purchase. I do have older cats and they don't like the skin part because it's a lot of chewing I guess. Obviously since it's the best part for them, they want nothing to do with it! We give it to them whole and just pick up any leftover skin parts (and hope they at least gnawed on it a bit). They won't eat joint supplements but the omegas are good for their joints and coat and I think there's been an improvement. We'll have to see what the vet says!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Schweiss

customer_reviews.title: Package says not to exceed recommended dosage but doesn't say what the dosage should be
customer_reviews.text: Did I miss it? Package says not to exceed recommended dosage but doesn't say what the dosage should be??? I'll give it three stars for now because my cat really likes it. If it cures his dandruff I'll change it to 5.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Says, “Yummy, Give Me More!”
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat absolutely loves these. I give them as treats sometimes and also sprinkle a little on her food so the ultimate picky eater will eat it. I’m so glad you helped add to the quality of life of her waning years left on this earth. It’s sad, but true. She is 16 1/2 wonderful years old and I love her. She has kitty Alzheimer’s, so like I said, anything to make her happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with product quality, natural with nothing artificial. Also the customer service with this company is top tier and very responsive if you have any concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: They are great training treats for my lab!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found these! My dog absolutely loves them! I've been training him to do some new tricks and taking him around more dogs and so I've needed a different kind of treat to really make all this worth it for him (or so it feels!).. These get him really excited and it's all going so well! I'm glad its good for his joints too.Mine is only a year old but it's never too early to start thinking of those kinds of things when it comes to your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Devin de

customer_reviews.title: And he loves it so that’s great.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my cat, because he was starting to get really dry skin. He’s been on it for about 6 weeks or so and it’s helped his skin a lot. He isn’t as sensitive or flakey anymore. And he loves it so that’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Tpassarini

customer_reviews.title: Used to correct a serious feline  behavior issue
customer_reviews.text: We have six indoor cats, rescues, and they all absolutely love these treats. They beg for them at certain times of the day. I’ve even used these to correct behavioral issues. One of our male cats was urinating outside the box. So as soon as I saw him actually urinate inside the box, I immediately told him “good boy” and gave him one of these treats. No more behavior issues! What a relief. Now he uses the box every time then immediately lets me know it’s time for a salmon treat. A very good training aid. They also seem to be all natural and real. So I’m not worried about giving our cats a harmful chemical laden product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Winter

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats needs daily meds. This was becoming a big problem because she started getting finicky and would not take the pill pockets anymore. What I did was wrap her pill with a flavored pill wrap and then stick to a piece of the salmon treats. GREAT SUCCESS as now she takes her pills with no issues. My other cat comes running and he gets a treat too. He has skin issues so I like that he is getting the Omegas.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: High Value Treat for the beagles
customer_reviews.text: My two beagles love these treats. I consider them to be "high value" treats which they love and will do anything for. I currently use them before and after I administer medication to my dogs. My older beagle will run right to me for her eye drops because she knows she is getting something good before and after. The one thing is that they do smell like fish (because they are), but if you open and close the package the smell is not an issue. The pieces are nice and small so I am not overfeeding them and can portion control. These are currently their favorite treat.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hyde

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are foodies. Unfortunately, my dogs don’t like these
customer_reviews.text: You know dogs don’t particularly like something when they take a step back, stretch their necks to sniff the treat and give you that “okay, I’ll eat it but only because I love you.” look. I like the idea of healthy treats. Unfortunately my dogs don’t like them. Why do nutritious treats taste horrible and the tasty treats have poor nutritional value? If they do happen to be both they’re expensive as heck. If it’s between yummy dog treats and steak ... I’m getting a steak. Of course I would share the steak with my fur kids 😊
customer_reviews.author: miisu

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them! I find them a little hard to break
customer_reviews.text: I have been using freeze dried salmon as a food topper for my dog for a couple years now. I had to switch from my usual brand (Wellness Core) because they stopped selling this product. I found Zesty Paws and I am pleased with the quality of the product, my dog loves the little pieces of salmon on his food and it encourages him to eat it (he is a picky senior Chihuahua). However, I find these treats harder to break into smaller pieces than the old brand, I end up with dried salmon dust instead of small pieces. My dog does not seem to mind, though.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Natural and Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a treat that was natural and healthy for my cats. Fish oil is great for their joints and coat and so these treats seemed to be the best way for them to naturally get these quality ingredients. My cat Phoenix is in love with these treats and in fact behaves as of they were kitty crack! Lol. They have a good mix of large chunks, small strips, meat bites and skin bites. Because of this you can tell its all natural. I will definately be adding these to his regular rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: 5 for 5-liked by 1 dog and 4 cats!
customer_reviews.text: Who should I say loves these, my dog or the 4 cats or me? It is hard to find treats for both dog and cats, especially when cats can be fussy! Well, all 5 loved them. They are great because they are different sized, shapes and textures, some are crunchier than others, so I can hand pick who gets what. The toothless cat gets the smaller soft ones, the dog gets bigger crisper ones. There are a lot in each bag too. The only problem is they could gobble up They would eat the whole bag if I let them!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Smith

customer_reviews.title: Peaches loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty was diagnosed with positive FIV antibody, and the vet recommended as a supplement to make sure he gets plenty of the omega fatty acids. I have tried so many different treats and supplements. He turned his nose up to all the treats, and wouldn't eat anything I pumped the salmon oil on, resisted it and the capsules. But the day the first package of these freeze-dried salmon treats arrived, he started meowing as soon as I opened the bag, and comes running whenever he hears me getting it out of the cabinet. He loves them and wants them mixed into all his food.
customer_reviews.author: AmberL

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love this!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried this product my kitties wouldn't touch it, it took another time before they would try it. I'm so glad I tried again because it's now their favorite snack and they go crazy for it. I do have to use little scissors to cut the chunks and skin into smaller pieces but it's so worth it. I'm going on my third container and will continue to purchase from this company. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG, TOUGH CHUNKS - cut them with scissors
customer_reviews.text: Chunks are far too big for kitties and too tough for them to chew up. I used scissors to cut them into kitty-bite size pieces. One chunk made four bites. On the plus side, even my picky eater gobbled the little bites down. Hopefully there will be no digestive issues (barfing of the treat and everything they ha eaten all day) like they had with other types of salmon treats (Greenies). Now if they will only help with the dandruff issues I will be a happy kitty mom.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cargill

customer_reviews.title: Chief Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I met this giant Cane Corso named Chief while working near the Philadelphia Art Museum. His mom told me he was allergic to chicken, so I picked these up to keep on hand so I could give him something to look forward to while out on his daily walks. He goes absolutely nuts over this simple healthy snack! I get covered in slobber by this gentle giant but it’s totally worth it! I see him look for me every time he walks by my job site!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend-too tough
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like these much because the treats are very tough and hard. I had to peel off the soft parts of the treat so the cat could eat it because I didn’t want them to choke on the parts. I knew some other reviewers said their cat choked on the treat so that should’ve been my first warning. Some parts just had to be thrown away because they were hard as rocks. Definitely don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: They love it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat and dog love these. They are USA proud and human-grade salmon. I read some reviews prior to buying saying the pieces are too big, especially the skin, and choke their cat. I remove the skin and give it to my labrador, and crumble the salmon meat for my cat. I get a bag every other month. Sometimes it's big chunks, sometimes crumbles. They love it and I'll keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Healthy Lab-RADor Tested
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit i was a bit skeptical due to the texture of the product, its rather, paper..ry . My dog had to scope it out for a minute but thats about all it took before it was just a memory. These contain natural ingriedients to help with the aging mobility issues of my lab. ****For Those People in These Reviews Complaining That these Treats Are Choking Their Cats: The Packaging States " FOR CANINE USE ONLY" Your Welcome These are pawsome for your canine furbaby and they will love you 💜💙
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: GMO free, tasty, one ingredient treat
customer_reviews.text: Oy! My cat likes this too much! I just received my reorder from Amazon. The only ingredient is wild caught Pacific sockeye salmon that is raw and freeze dried. It’s GMO free...which means the salmon hasn’t fallen into the clutches of scientists and had its DNA modified. Although it’s human grade, I haven’t and will not taste it but the way my cat grabs it from my hand, I can attest that it’s tasty. It’s an expensive treat, but my cat is worth it and I offer it in moderation.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Shipping times with this company
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs love LOVE them. They had to figure out to get them a little wet first though since they’re freeze dried but that didn’t take them long at all. Wish it said somewhere about how much you should give to your dogs. Smell awful and bought a few things from zesty paws lately and NONE arrive when it says and always say delayed. Might help if they didn’t wait days to actually ship the items. Not sure if that’s Amazon slacking or Zesty Paws. Certainly irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: real salmon, skin is tough
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this treat, it's really helped her get smooth fur and be less itchy. My pupper is allergic to lots of things and these treats help her allergies a lot. The only thing is that the pieces with the skin attached are tough for her to eat. She's an 8 year old, 7 pound Maltese, with some missing teeth, I am constantly afraid that she'll choke on the skin. Really great otherwise and it's safe enough for human consumption, real salmon.
customer_reviews.author: ss.lee

customer_reviews.title: A hit with our whole crew!
customer_reviews.text: We have a picky puggle dog and four finicky felines and they all loved these treats! Like, "stampede from all corners of the house when you open the jar" kind of love. We found these easy to serve and like that they came in a jar instead of a bag. These didn't crumble in my hands like a lot of freeze dried treats do, and the sizes of the treats were more uniform than other kinds we've tried. I would recommend these treats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: memling

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment with Zesty Paws
customer_reviews.text: I've had freeze dried salmon from another company and was.very content with it but found availability an issue so I tried this brand. I was very disappointed. The pieces were not uniform and my cat had.difficulty eating them. There was an over abundance of dried skin which was thready and fibrous and not ediable. The smell was like a stench. Not very pleasant. I wouldn't recommend this product. I'm going to stick with CatManDoo Life Essentials freeze dried salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary A. Pressley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old cat suffered from arthritic pain. All I know is that after about a month of being on these, she is like a new cat!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loved This But Some Strips Choke Hazards
customer_reviews.text: My dog initially loved these freeze dried Salmon treats, but then as I gave her some more, there were strips that were extremely tough, like tough rawhide, that could choke her. I put them in my own mouth using my mollar teeth and could not chew or break these strips apart. I notified the seller by FB messenger and attached a video as prrof.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: My cats and dog love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats and dog love it soooo much, they are queuing for it every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ruirui

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor; Pieces are Too Big and Too Sharp; Have to Cut First
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love they treats! The treats are too sharp and too big for cats, so I have to cut them with scissors, while they wait to play their brain puzzle game, foraging for treats. They’ll do anything for these treats. It’s a bummer that I have to chop them all u first, but safety is important.
customer_reviews.author: Arizonadesertgirl

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: My cats smell the salmon from down stairs. They see me touch the container and come running. My cat is about to be 11. I bought some treats, such as this, that would help her coat, energy and simply wellbeing. I want my babies to love forever, you know? Anyways, her coat is stunning! No more dandruff or cat acne. She’s running everywhere, including up the stairs whereas she took one at a time before. Completely changed my girl. I inserted a picture of her licking her chops after INHALING the treat.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: My Boston Terrier loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea on the taste, but, my Boston Terrier absolutely LOVES it!! It smells as expected... fishy. It looks like Salmon, but, freeze dried. I had to order another bag because is almost out. I will continue to order this product as she loves it!! I am very happy with the product and my baby gir gave it two enthusiastic paws up... 🐾!!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkster

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for bones and pieces with hard skin
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it but you have to be very careful when you give this to them because it sometimes has very sharp bones and large pieces with very hard skin. The smaller pieces are great but it’s unfortunate you have to inspect the larger pieces carefully so it’s not a choking hazard or bones don’t cause injury.
customer_reviews.author: Life After Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Sadly it is mostly salmon DUST
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely LOVE THESE. Almost above everybody else! Major problem is it’s mostly POWDER. I bought twice from Amazon thinking first time was the delivery issue. But second time packed safely it is still mostly dust. Cannot give treats like this. Regardless how much they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Wishedon

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Well, speaking on behalf of my dog, she absolutely loves these nice fishy treats. They are healthy and really just pure dried salmon pieces, skin and all. Okay, does not smell so good to me, but the lid stays on tight. She could eat the whole jar. Barks after our walk to get one - or two - or three.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty approved
customer_reviews.text: Update. Please never stop making these!!!! I think our baby will disown us. Lol I was shocked how dry these really were. But giving 5 stars because my baby loves these. Which I'm grateful for because I want her to get her extra nutrition. I highly suggest for the furbaby cats. That you remove the tails. These are quite large for a cat and they can most definitely choke on the tails. I might be a worrywart Mommy. But I wanted to make sure that I noted this.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Fixsen

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs and cats with dry and flakey skin
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dog that had flakey, dry skin. Of course my cat also wanted to try it. They both love it. Anytime I grab it the both run towards me. I give it straight as a treat and when I see they aren't eating their food I use as a food topper. It does have a strong fishy smelly so make sure to wash your hands well. Overall, my dogs skin and coat has improved greatly. The flakes are gone and her coat looks shiny. Her scratching and biting has decreased since her skin has gotten better.
customer_reviews.author: Jsand

customer_reviews.title: Loved by dogs and cats!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and cats live these! I especially like that these are nice bite size pieces for my small dogs and cats. Other brands that i have tried have much larger pieces and i usually have to break them apart before giving them to my pets. No choking hazard with Zesty Paws, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa's favorites

customer_reviews.title: Best salmon treats I've found
customer_reviews.text: I've used several different brands of freeze dried salmon treats with my dog, and these are her favorite by far. They smell like real salmon so she gets super excited as soon as the bag is open and they are highly motivating for her. The pieces are also a great size for training or small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fussner

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order the biggest bag!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have never had dried salmon before. You’d think it was “dog crack”. 🤣 With such a distinctive fish odor it was hard to hide them. My dogs were constantly begging for more. Some pieces were bigger than others and so I wasn’t sure how much per size/weight they could have or their ultimate reaction since it was new. I just know it has to be one of the healthiest treats they’ve had the pleasure of eating in awhile. 👍🐶
customer_reviews.author: MesabaMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat For My Dogs
customer_reviews.text: WOW; my fur babies just loves the Freeze Dried Salmon Treats!!! As soon as I go into the kitchen and open the bag, the come running and sit nicely to get their treat. I am happy with the single ingredient treat and its wild salmon!!! This is an awesome, healthy treat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tomosawa

customer_reviews.title: Pet approved
customer_reviews.text: I like that these don't have any questionable ingredients. I also like the skin and fur benefits from fish. Haven't been using them long enough to see a difference, but Turnip is crazy about the flavor. I crumble them as a meal topper. Our cat came over when he smelled the fish. Gave him one too :) They're definitely smelly, but I mean its 100% fish.
customer_reviews.author: Unforeshadowed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving the Freeze Drive Salmon Filet Treats to my 20 years old cat. As he get older he started to have severe allergy symptoms . He started to sound like he has bronchitis when he hiss. I've learned that the Salmon oil can boost his immunity and may help with his allergy but CATS DO NOT like salmon oil. So, I've decided to give him the Freeze Dried Salmon Fillet Treats instead. He LOVES the salmon treats and he begs for more everyday. Over time, we noticed that it is helping with his allergy. We are going to continue to give him the Salmon Filet Treats!!
customer_reviews.author: MR. Poodles

customer_reviews.title: Encourages my cat to eat.
customer_reviews.text: I buy the freeze dried salmon treats for my cat. He can be a bit fussy at mealtime. I take a piece of the freeze dried salmon and crumble it on top. He will finish his meal every time after I do that. A great product! I use auto-ship with amazon.com to make sure I never run out. Happy kitty! 🐱
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Miller

customer_reviews.title: My dog drools over these
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. She will pretty much eat pretty much anything but she goes crazy for these. She tries to open the container & we use it as a training reward. Im using this to treat a mild case of mange that she had & I do see some improvement. There are quite a few bigger pieces. About the size of a starburst & the smaller pieces i sprinkle in her food. I will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Janeta

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, and the dogs too
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a treat box , keeps the kitten interested till he gets his treat out, had to keep the bottle in the cupboard he knocked it down on the floor letting the dogs chew it open , feast for everyone while mom was gone, the dogs i hide bits in the living room and they sniff to find them , fun activity for the winter blues.
customer_reviews.author: Cat3

customer_reviews.title: Grandma Dog with skin issues
customer_reviews.text: My 17-year-old Husky mix who is allergic to EVERYTHING absolutely loves these things. I think that she asks to go out more often so that she can get a treat when coming back in. No adverse affects to her skin (really a good thing) & just soft enough for her to chew without a problem. Love this company & their commitment to finding good quality stuff for our pets.
customer_reviews.author: CubsFan

customer_reviews.title: Not for picky cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat really liked these bites, however, there was a lot of dust in the bottom of the container and most of the pieces had hard skin on them, which my cat won't eat. Maybe some pets aren't as picky as mine and the will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Auburnaire

customer_reviews.title: Pups were happy!
customer_reviews.text: My six month old lab and 11 year old malamute absolutely LOVED these treats! I used them alone for training the puppy and as a topper for my senior dogs food. They're light so they can eat more than one and nutritious, they contain only one ingredient- salmon! The smell is a little off putting but they smell as fish would and since they were for the dogs it really didn't matter to me. Very impressed and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Natural
customer_reviews.text: My pack loves these treats. And I love them because they are natural and high in Omega-3! They have ONE ingredient, that’s all!! Freeze dried Wild Pacific Salmon. You can’t get healthier than that. I also love the Zesty Paws company. They are super nice, helpful and stand by their products. We have many of them.
customer_reviews.author: WndyNewton

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other brands I have tried, these kitty treats are so hard, especially the leathery skin on them, that they made one of my cats throw up. They like the taste but I have to grind them up and pulverize the skin before they are able to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Moon

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it...
customer_reviews.text: I add this treat as a topper for my dog's food. She seems to like it and would finish all of her food when I crumble it up and mix it into her food. It can be difficult to crumble if it has the skin. Also, it doesn't have a strong fish smell when I opened the bag or every time I open it. Additionally, I have the Blue Wilderness treats in Salmon flavor and my dog stopped eating them and preferred this Zesty brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: j_21

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved them
customer_reviews.text: Cat loved these and was immediately addicted. She is not the Einstein of her species so, as a precaution, I peeled off the random bits of skin to prevent any choking issues. It's hard and fibrous but fairly easy to remove even without a knife. The larger pieces can be broken into a more manageable size for small dogs or stupid cats. It's a little pricey but doesn't smell as bad as cat treats. Overall I think it's a good product. Stupid cat concurs.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Good for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog with not many teeth left and a young pup with acid reflux. These treats are great for both. The pup with acid reflux has to keep some food in his belly at all times and this is a great protein to grab for him between meal times. They are soft so that my senior can munch on them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Molly K

customer_reviews.title: Not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: They used to sell in plastic container. And my most sensitive stomach cat never had an issue eating this. After they start selling in the refill like bag, my cat started having loose stomach when he eat this. I’m about to cancel my auto delivery and look for different product.
customer_reviews.author: BCHDIVE

customer_reviews.title: Tasty training treats
customer_reviews.text: All my pets love these fishy treats and come running to the sound of a crinkling bag. Most of the pieces are free of skin although there are a few hard, inedible pieces. Don't leave the bag in an accessible location because the pets will get into it!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald & Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing treat for great dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Vegas absolutely loved these treats! Once he got a taste, the next time I started going towards the bag he immediately came running and sat like a good boy. They’re well made, have a great scent, and are easily used for training.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: My cat wouldn't touch these
customer_reviews.text: Shame...I was hoping to find a treat without chicken or corn. I got these based on reviews. But my cat wouldn't touch them. She has food allergies and is on a strict fish diet. She usually loves all fish/tuna, but wouldn't touch these treats. Such a shame - so darn expensive and I ended up throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: BArnold

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these! I get super sniffed when I have a small ziplock bag of them in my pocket. They don't smell fishy because they are freeze dried. Another option for high value treats to use when training.
customer_reviews.author: LorChaBud

customer_reviews.title: The first bottle was Freeze Dried Salmon Treats.. ...
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle was Freeze Dried Salmon Treats...My dog (a Standard Poodle, named TEAKI) ...the second is OMEGA-3 Salmon Treats and in both types...I have Not been able to have the treats where she can see the containers... TEAKI loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Conch

customer_reviews.title: My finicky cat loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats, but I made them 4 star for two reasons: she doesn't like the dried skin, which is still on the pieces. Also, the pieces are way too big for a little kitty cat. I have to cut them all up into bite sized pieces. Otherwise, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking42

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small dog that tends to swallow without chewing there’s too much salmon skin in this and it’s not just dried salmon meat. After swiping salmon skin out of my dog’s throat 2ce I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: A. R.

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be messy
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves salmon. She really enjoyed pieces on her kibble. You can crumble most pieces. I felt the fish skin pieces were too hard to give her so I would always be peeling the freeze dry off the skin and it was kind of inconvenient and I always had to wash my hands after.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Love Zesty Paws!!
customer_reviews.text: My pup has no complaints!!! She goes nuts for them. I’m not a huge fan of the smell but I’ll deal with it cause she likes the treat! I’m not surprised though everything we’ve ever ordered from Zesty Paws has been top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Mayo

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are extremely fussy about treats and won't eat most of them but they love these. I like the high quality of wild caught, human grade salmon that is a product of the USA. I would recommend these treats for dogs and cats.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia. L

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love them, but smell
customer_reviews.text: These are great high quality treats for our allergy sensitive dog. They do have a very strong salmon smell, so don't give them these and have guests over. (But any of the salmon food.treats will do that...)
customer_reviews.author: Cigi

customer_reviews.title: Cat used to love this
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a good product until my last order. Mostly dried skin, also whatever little salmon there was it was too dried like it was stale or over dried. My cat won’t eat it. Have to find another supplier.
customer_reviews.author: MissyCat

customer_reviews.title: Nasty  chocking hazard for smaller animals
customer_reviews.text: They smelled and were about 30% skin which was very tough hard to cut. My cat who is addicted to freeze dried salmon rejected them. I would had returned them if my printer worked. My cat is average sized 10 pounds. They are Nasty
customer_reviews.author: Hollyseattle

customer_reviews.title: Salmon Treats
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several bottles of this brand. Although most of the bottles were great with amazing pieces of salmon and hardly any skin. The last few bottles were filled with tiny bits of salmon but a ton of skin on the pieces as well as supplying the jar with primarily Salmon Skins. I hope they do revamp this product and reduce the amount of skin as my dog chokes on it. I would love to have this product back up to its five start rating.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Concannon

customer_reviews.title: how good it is
customer_reviews.text: i noticed my dog had dry, flaky skin, i researched what i could do. i didn't want to apply anything on her coat. i saw this recommodation and thought i would try it. well she no longer has the itchy dry, flaky skin. she absolutly loves this product. i give to my cats as well.
customer_reviews.author: toots

customer_reviews.title: Would stand on their heads for these if possible!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 rescue dogs will do ANYTHING for these salmon bites! So nice to have these in my “tool kit” when working on leash aggression and friendly play around the house that occasionally turns less friendly. No toy or activity has a higher value than these salmon treats!
customer_reviews.author: Kim W. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Wild caught dehydrated salmon.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 cats and 3 dogs love these. I have a variety of sizes of pets from small cats (no longer kittens, just small) and a chihuahua to medium sized 55 pound border collie. I feel good about feeding these. Just dehydrated wild salmon.
customer_reviews.author: lorrie

customer_reviews.title: They’d eat them all at once if I’d let them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these! They’d probably eat the whole container at once if I’d let them! They do have a strong smell but that’s to be expected considering what it is, and it’s worth it to find something so good for the dogs that they love!
customer_reviews.author: Shanell

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs acted like this was the best thing that ever happened to them. They were really sad when the package was empty! We'll have to get more ASAP. Especially great for my diabetic dog.
customer_reviews.author: izzyb

customer_reviews.title: The cat's are enjoying them
customer_reviews.text: My male cat was a bit apprehensive at first but he has come around. The girl loved them from the start. There is a lot of skin only pieces which the boy doesn't like and the girl finds too chewy. I will order again though.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved it
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because my dog loved it and would go crazy when I showed him the bag. I feel it really helped Him with itchy skin due to allergies.
customer_reviews.author: MasPeg

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Both dogs love the salmon treats, and I feel good giving them to them. Not some mushed up “what is it” kind of treat. You can actually see what it is.
customer_reviews.author: gr8dane

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The animals seem to like these okay. They are a bit smelly. Also the packaging is completely different than what is shown they are not in bags they are in plastic jars
customer_reviews.author: Pixcm

customer_reviews.title: Best salmon treats I've found
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these treats are a little stinky to some, but the smell of dried fish has never bothered me and it DEFINITELY doesn't bother my dogs - they all come running for these! I show two of my dogs. I had planned to cut a few of these salmon bites up for use in the ring, but we zoomed through the first jar too quickly and it was empty before I knew it. I'll have to wait for the next shows to try them as ring bait. Think I'm going to have to always order 2 jars at a time, just to make sure I always have some on hand!
customer_reviews.author: k9gurl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Both my canine and feline love these treats. I share with neighbor canines and they are so enjoyed, I have gifted these canisters to follow dog owners with whom I am very friendly. They smell like fresh salmon. I now subscribe
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are very small and a lot of it is powdered. I had intended it to be a treat but with the pieces being so small I am just mixing it in their food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love salmon!
customer_reviews.text: These great health treats are very much enjoyed by my two miniature dachshunds. The jar is huge and lasts us for months. When the people get fish, so do the pups! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: whitedachs

customer_reviews.title: Treat you Dog to Something Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My dog needs single ingredient treats. If you buy Salmon anything for your pet it should be Wild Caught. These are high value treats to get your dog to do the hard things for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Pomage

customer_reviews.title: Most loved treat in the WORLD!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my older cats and they are absolutely in love with it. It is their bedtime snack and they know when it is time to get a snack and go to bed!! Healthy and easy to give to them. The pieces are perfect size and easy for them to chew. We tried another brand and found a lot of them hard to chew and very VERY tiny pieces! more like scraps! A must for any cat lover/owner/parent.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Mulkey

customer_reviews.title: Pets love it!
customer_reviews.text: Both my dog and cat love this freeze-dried salmon. I use it as a topper for my dog and as treats for my cat! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are so well packaged there are huge chunks of salmon and some even have the skin on. They must roll the salmon in crack because my cat goes INSANE for these! Will definitely order more. Cat will leave if I don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Leathem

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: To be fair the scent makes me want to barf what my dog loves them. Tell this all that matters. And a little goes a long way with this bag
customer_reviews.author: Kimtastic

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs and cats
customer_reviews.text: My dog, and cat, really enjoy these pieces sized for dogs and cats. I know these treats are great because my cats put up a long exploration before eating.
customer_reviews.author: Bates Botting

customer_reviews.title: High quality salmon treats
customer_reviews.text: My big dog loves these treats! You can tell they are real salmon - they are like pieces of fish, just freeze dried. Some have bits of skin still on them. Relative to other brands at the same price, these are a good deal for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy treats
customer_reviews.text: These treats are awesome! My 8 month old goldendoodle puppy goes crazy for them whenever we bring them out. I was shocked to find out that the only ingredient is salmon and it makes me happy knowing I’m giving my puppy something with zero added ingredients. These are great treats and we will definitely be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget W

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love these salmon treats. I was impressed that you could still see that it was real salmon!! We have noticed their coat seems shinier as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Latscha

customer_reviews.title: I have to cut it up....ekk
customer_reviews.text: My cat couldn't chew even a small piece of skin and there's a lot of it. I would cut the large pieces and chop the skin off, wouldn't peel off. LOVED the taste of it. She would go crazy when I brought the jar out.
customer_reviews.author: KBDugas

customer_reviews.title: Maybe these are good for dogs, but too tough for cats
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our cats, but they arrived with thick skins on many of the pieces and our cats had difficult time eating them. We were forced to go through the entire box and remove a lot of the skins, which was kind of a gross process. They smell fishy unlike some other brands of salmon treats that I've purchased. I think these might work for a dog with stronger jaw muscles, but they are not suitable for cats.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Pure salmon, important
customer_reviews.text: Pure salmon, and if you're a cat, what's not to love? Our pair of sphynx cats will jockey for the best position when its treat time. They know this stuff and will not take an imitation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Beers

customer_reviews.title: Dog will not eat.
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad, dog wont eat it even covered in soft food. Tossed it after trying it out on my grandmother's dog and it kept running away
customer_reviews.author: Tani & Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Fresh product,  great quality!
customer_reviews.text: very fresh product, alittle fishy, but no additives which is great. fast shipping. my picky dogs love them!
customer_reviews.author: JHammonds

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of our dogs absolutely love these treats! We even have a dog that is not fond of fish and even he likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Cut these up if you feed them to your cat dry
customer_reviews.text: Cats wouldn’t eat it wet- one choked badly on the tough skin dry- cut it into tiny pieces
customer_reviews.author: PandaJosie

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for the pups!
customer_reviews.text: Biff loves this treat- he loves his fish! It’s healthy for him and he thinks it’s delicious. Fish isn’t the best scent, but the nutrients that come are worth the stink fish smell! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Stout

product_meta.title: Zesty Paws Freeze Dried Salmon Filet Treats for Dogs & Cats - with Pure Raw & Wild Caught Pacific Sockeye Salmon Fish - Omega 3 EPA + DHA Fatty Acids for Joint & Immune Support + Skin & Coat Health
feature_bullets: REAL WILD CAUGHT SALMON – Zesty Paws Freeze Dried Salmon Treats are human grade chews from sockeye salmon, and undergo a rapid freeze drying process to preserve Omega-3 fish oil content to ensure the best nourishment for any dog and cat.

RICH OMEGA 3 FATTY ACIDS – These grain free snacks are loaded with EPA and DHA to help pets stay in great shape. Omegas have been shown to provide hip and joint support for your pet, while also supporting the heart and immune system.

SKIN & COAT CARE SUPPORT – Freeze Dried Salmon Treats help to nourish skin and coats with natural fatty acids in every piece. It's also great for dogs with flaky skin, and helps the coat appear softer and shinier with less shedding.

JOINT & IMMUNE HEALTH – The omegas in these natural Freeze-Dried Salmon Treats have been shown to help promote relief from joint discomfort to restore flexibility, while also bolstering immune function to keep them feeling healthy.

A PET SUPPLEMENT YOU CAN TRUST - Zesty Paws understands how much your dog's health and wellness means to you, so these treats were made with one important goal in mind - to keep your pet as strong as the bond they share with you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
